31 
32  void KSGenDirectionSphericalComposite::Dice( KSParticleQueue* aPrimaries )
33  {
34  if ( !fThetaValue || !fPhiValue )
35  genmsg( eError ) << "theta or phi value undefined in composite direction creator <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
36 
37  KThreeVector tMomentum;
38 
39  KSParticle* tParticle;
40  KSParticleIt tParticleIt;
41  KSParticleQueue tParticles;
42 
43  double tThetaValue;
44  vector< double > tThetaValues;
45  vector< double >::iterator tThetaValueIt;
46 
47  double tPhiValue;
48  vector< double > tPhiValues;
49  vector< double >::iterator tPhiValueIt;
50 
51  fThetaValue->DiceValue( tThetaValues );
52  fPhiValue->DiceValue( tPhiValues );
53 
54  for( tThetaValueIt = tThetaValues.begin(); tThetaValueIt != tThetaValues.end(); tThetaValueIt++ )
55  {
56  tThetaValue = (KConst::Pi() / 180.) * (*tThetaValueIt);
57  for( tPhiValueIt = tPhiValues.begin(); tPhiValueIt != tPhiValues.end(); tPhiValueIt++ )
58  {
59  tPhiValue = (KConst::Pi() / 180.) * (*tPhiValueIt);
60  for( tParticleIt = aPrimaries->begin(); tParticleIt != aPrimaries->end(); tParticleIt++ )
61  {
62  tParticle = new KSParticle( **tParticleIt );
63  tMomentum = tParticle->GetMomentum().Magnitude() * (sin( tThetaValue ) * cos( tPhiValue ) * fXAxis + sin( tThetaValue ) * sin( tPhiValue ) * fYAxis + cos( tThetaValue ) * fZAxis);
64  tParticle->SetMomentum( tMomentum );
65  tParticles.push_back( tParticle );
66  }
67  }
68  }
69 
70  for( tParticleIt = aPrimaries->begin(); tParticleIt != aPrimaries->end(); tParticleIt++ )
71  {
72  tParticle = *tParticleIt;
73  delete tParticle;
74  }
75 
76  aPrimaries->assign( tParticles.begin(), tParticles.end() );
77 
78  return;
79  }
80 
81  void KSGenDirectionSphericalComposite::SetThetaValue( KSGenValue* anThetaValue )
82  {
83  if( fThetaValue == NULL )
84  {
85  fThetaValue = anThetaValue;
86  return;
87  }
88  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot set theta value <" << anThetaValue->GetName() << "> to composite direction creator <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
89  return;
90  }
91  void KSGenDirectionSphericalComposite::ClearThetaValue( KSGenValue* anThetaValue )
92  {
93  if( fThetaValue == anThetaValue )
94  {
95  fThetaValue = NULL;
96  return;
97  }
98  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot clear theta value <" << anThetaValue->GetName() << "> from composite direction creator <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
99  return;
100  }
101 
102  void KSGenDirectionSphericalComposite::SetPhiValue( KSGenValue* aPhiValue )
103  {
104  if( fPhiValue == NULL )
105  {
106  fPhiValue = aPhiValue;
107  return;
108  }
109  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot set phi value <" << aPhiValue->GetName() << "> to composite direction creator <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
110  return;
111  }
112  void KSGenDirectionSphericalComposite::ClearPhiValue( KSGenValue* anPhiValue )
113  {
114  if( fPhiValue == anPhiValue )
115  {
116  fPhiValue = NULL;
117  return;
118  }
119  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot clear phi value <" << anPhiValue->GetName() << "> from composite direction creator <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
120  return;
121  }

139  void KSGenDirectionSphericalComposite::InitializeComponent()
140  {
141  if( fThetaValue != NULL )
142  {
143  fThetaValue->Initialize();
144  }
145  if( fPhiValue != NULL )
146  {
147  fPhiValue->Initialize();
148  }
149  return;
150  }
151  void KSGenDirectionSphericalComposite::DeinitializeComponent()
152  {
153  if( fThetaValue != NULL )
154  {
155  fThetaValue->Deinitialize();
156  }
157  if( fPhiValue != NULL )
158  {
159  fPhiValue->Deinitialize();
160  }
161  return;
162  }

164  STATICINT sKSGenDirectionSphericalCompositeDict =
165  KSDictionary< KSGenDirectionSphericalComposite >::AddCommand( &KSGenDirectionSphericalComposite::SetThetaValue, &KSGenDirectionSphericalComposite::ClearThetaValue, "set_theta", "clear_theta" ) +
166  KSDictionary< KSGenDirectionSphericalComposite >::AddCommand( &KSGenDirectionSphericalComposite::SetPhiValue, &KSGenDirectionSphericalComposite::ClearPhiValue, "set_phi", "clear_phi" );
